getExactInput(address[],uint256).details: Return (false, 0) if DEX cannot swap the input amount

getExactOutput(address[],uint256).details: Return (false, 0) if DEX cannot give the output amount.       Note: No need to reverse the path for this function

params._exchangeRouter: Address of the DEX router contract

params._path: List of tokens that are used for exchanging

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setExchangeRouter(address).details: Set address of liquidity pool factory from the exchange router

params._exchangeRouter: Address of the new exchange router contract

setFeeTier(address,address,uint24).details: We set the fee tier that is used for exchanging tokens

swap(uint256,uint256,address[],address,u.details: Check exchange conditions before exchanging      We assume that the input token is not WETH (it is teleBTC)

params._isFixedToken: True if the input token amount is fixed
params._path: List of tokens that are used for exchanging

returns._amounts: Amounts of tokens that are involved in exchanging
returns._result: True if the exchange is successful

swapAndAddLiquidity((uint256,address,add.details: This function performs the following steps:      1. Validates gas reserve and pool existence      2. Normalizes token order to match pool configuration      3. Validates existing position parameters if updating      4. Executes optimal swaps to achieve desired token ratios      5. Mints new position or increases existing position liquidity      6. Refunds any remaining tokens to the user

params.params: Struct containing all parameters for the operation

returns._remaining0: Amount of token0 remaining after operation
returns._remaining1: Amount of token1 remaining after operation
returns._tokenId: The ID of the created/updated position

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

getExactInput(address[],uint256).notice: Return the output amount for the given input amount

getExactOutput(address[],uint256).notice: Return the needed input amount to get the output amount

getSqrtPriceX96(address[]).notice: Return the square root price of given token pairs

initialize(string,address,address).notice: This contract is used for interacting with UniswapV3 contract

isPathValid(address[]).notice: Return true if the exchange path is valid

swap(uint256,uint256,address[],address,u.notice: Exchange input token for output token through exchange router

swapAndAddLiquidity((uint256,address,add.notice: Zap tokens into a Uniswap V3 position in one call
